meta.description: Lumi is an open-source desktop app that allows you to create, edit, view and share interactive content with dozens of different content types.
meta.keywords: create, share, interactive content, interactive exercises, h5p, e-learning, elearning, scorm, xapi, authoring tool, offline, standalone, html5

home.welcome: Lumi is a desktop app that allows you to create, edit, view and share interactive content with dozens of different content types. It's free and open source.

newsletter.placeholder: enter your email address to receive our newsletter

features.heading: Create, edit and view H5P files directly on your computer.

h5p.heading: All H5P Hub Content Types
h5p.description: You can choose from over 40 content types and directly download them from the H5P Hub.

use.heading: Easy to use
use.description: You don't need any programming knowledge to create engaging interactive content with Lumi!

preview.heading: Quick preview
preview.description: Check your changes without saving by switching to the preview.

standalone.heading: Runs standalone
standalone.description: Lumi runs as a desktop program on your computer. No need for a LMS like Moodle or a CMS like WordPress.

htmlExport.heading: Pure HTML export
htmlExport.description: Save your content as all-in-one HTML files that work nearly everywhere and send it to your learners.

scormExport.heading: SCORM export
scormExport.description: Export your content as SCORM 1.2 packages that can be used in any compliant LMS.

analytics.heading: Get learner progress
analytics.description: Learners can download their progress with Lumi's reporter tool and send it to you for analysis.

openSource.heading: Free and Open Source
openSource.description: Lumi is licensed under the GNU Affero General Public License 3.0 and completely free. You can use content created with it in any way you like.

download.title: Download Lumi
download.bypass_smartscreen: Learn here how to bypass Windows's SmartScreen filter (only needed for exe-installer).

footer.mission: Make learning accessible, individual and exciting.
footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest news from Lumi.
